responsibilities: Design, develop, troubleshoot, and test/QA software.
Apply knowledge of software architecture to develop, debug, or design software applications or operating systems.
Build enhancements within an existing software architecture and suggest improvements to the architecture.
qualifications: Proficiency in programming languages: C, C++, C#, Java, JavaScript, Python, SQL, NoSQL, PL/SQL, or Go.

Knowledge of algorithms, operating systems, machine learning compilers, database systems, computer architecture, cloud computing, data mining, parallel programming, high performance computing, or compilers.
Experience with cloud stack for AWS, Azure, GCP, or OCI.
Understanding of storage systems including distributed storage.
Familiarity with databases including data structures, database management systems, and relational databases.

Experience with distributed systems, high performance computing, Linux operating systems, Grafana, web services, Kubernetes, Scrum and Agile methodologies, object-oriented design, network security, or big data.
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on designing, developing, troubleshooting, and testing software, as well as applying knowledge of software architecture to develop, debug, or design software applications or operating systems. The skills required include proficiency in various programming languages, knowledge of algorithms, operating systems, machine learning, cloud computing, and experience with distributed systems, databases, and high-performance computing.

While the job mentions machine learning, it does not specifically mention Generative AI or language models (LLMs). The focus seems to be more on general software development, cloud computing, and high-performance computing rather than on developing or working with GenAI or LLMs. There is no explicit mention of tasks or skills related to natural language processing, generative models, or specific frameworks or tools commonly associated with GenAI or LLMs.

Therefore, based on the provided responsibilities and skills, it does not appear that this job specifically involves working with Generative AI or language models.
